scripts.app:build-ios: cd mobile-app && eas build --platform ios --profile production
scripts.app:build-android: cd mobile-app && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.app:build-android-apk: cd mobile-app && eas build --platform android --profile preview
scripts.app:build-ios-sim: cd mobile-app && eas build -p ios --profile simulator
scripts.web:deploy: yarn workspace web-app build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy: yarn workspace web-app build && firebase deploy && exicube initialize
